about_the_game:
The I.O. Setter project is an indie horror game, from a third person, developed by one person, based on the Unreal Engine 5.



I.O. is a space project of a company that offered a new type of fuel that replaces conventional fuel with capsules for intravenous administration.
The main character of the story goes in search of a complex and technical artifacts for further resale on the black market.
At some point, reality begins to change. Things appear as if from another time, and strange voices hidden in the walls of I.O. begin to drive you crazy.



The environment will make you think that you are the only living being in this strange place. And you will be partly right.
You will have to face the ghosts of other people's nightmares, as well as the victims of the complex itself. Someone or something of them will want to help you if you help them.
And others will want to take you into their nightmares.



In early access from the arsenal, you will have access to a gravity cannon, a tool for manipulating a secret substance from I.O. labs.
Use this in conjunction with the environment to solve simple tasks or defend yourself.


- High quality graphics
- An environment that will make you feel like you are alone
- Interaction with the environment during battles
- Mysteries, secrets and puzzles are on your way
- The ability to use work tools as weapons

name: I.O. Setter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 2600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX570
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: The main character, astronaut marauder, a former engineer who managed to find out about the secret station, visits the abandoned I.O. complex in search of valuable technologies for further sale. He is absolutely sure that he is the only living being on the station, and in some ways he is right…
supported_languages:
English, Russian*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
